name: Oil Painting
description: Transform this image into an oil painting style with rich brushstrokes and deep color tones. The texture should appear layered, capturing movement and dimension with warm hues and vibrant contrasts.

name: Watercolor
description: Convert this image into a watercolor style, featuring soft, translucent washes of color. Let the edges blend to create a fluid, ethereal quality with gentle gradients and subtle color variations.

name: Impressionism
description: Render this image in an Impressionist style with loose brushstrokes and a focus on capturing light and atmosphere. Use vivid colors and emphasize natural light and shadow effects.

name: Cubism
description: Apply a Cubist style to this image by breaking it into geometric shapes and fragmented forms. Use multiple perspectives and muted colors to abstract and reinterpret the composition.

name: Pop Art
description: Transform this image into Pop Art with bold, vibrant colors and graphic elements. Use high contrast and flat colors to mimic the playful and iconic nature of commercial art.

name: Surrealism
description: Apply a Surrealist style to this image to create a dreamlike, fantastical atmosphere. Combine unexpected elements and unusual juxtapositions to evoke mystery and intrigue.

name: Expressionism
description: Convert this image into an Expressionist style, focusing on emotional impact with bold, distorted forms and exaggerated colors. Emphasize intense feelings and dynamic contrasts.

name: Gothic
description: Transform this image into a Gothic style with dark colors and intricate details. Emphasize dramatic contrasts and atmospheric effects to create a sense of mystery and grandeur.

name: Art Nouveau
description: Render this image in the Art Nouveau style with flowing, organic lines and elegant, stylized forms. Use harmonious colors and intricate, nature-inspired patterns.

name: Futurism
description: Apply a Futurist style to this image, focusing on dynamic movement and modern technology. Use bold lines and vibrant colors to convey speed and innovation.

name: Minimalism
description: Transform this image into a Minimalist style with simplicity and clarity. Use a limited color palette and focus on clean lines and essential forms.

name: Abstract Expressionism
description: Convert this image into Abstract Expressionism with spontaneous brushstrokes and a focus on color and form. Use vivid colors and energetic brushwork to express abstract concepts.

name: Sketch
description: Render this image in a Sketch style with expressive line work and shading. Use fine lines and hatching techniques to capture form and texture.

name: Pointillism
description: Apply a Pointillist style to this image using distinct dots of color. Emphasize optical mixing of colors through the arrangement of small dots for a textured effect.

name: Pop Surrealism
description: Transform this image into Pop Surrealism by blending bold colors with surreal, whimsical elements. Create a striking effect that combines playful and enigmatic qualities.

name: Chiaroscuro
description: Render this image in Chiaroscuro style focusing on the dramatic contrast between light and shadow. Highlight depth and volume with strong directional lighting and deep shadows.
